Public

    -Self:SELF.iconify_window
        See SDL_APPACTIVE loss event (see SDL_ActiveEvent) Iconify/Minimise the window

Public

    -Self:SELF.set_caption (:STRING_CONSTANT,:STRING_CONSTANT)
        set the window title and application name in the bar

Public

    -Self:SELF.set_title :STRING_CONSTANT

Public

    -Self:SELF.set_bmp_icon :STRING_CONSTANT
        Sets the icon for the display window. Icon must be 32x32
